resources.string:
Our app only provides links to official websites and/or YouTube channels that are publicly available. The content displayed within our app is not hosted on our servers, and we do not claim ownership or responsibility for any of the content. We do not intend to infringe any copyright, and we make every effort to ensure that our app only links to legitimate sources. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy or legality of the content provided by these external sources.

If you are a copyright holder and believe that any content provided through our app infringes your copyright, please contact us at [insert email address] with a detailed description of the alleged infringement. We will promptly investigate your claim and, if appropriate, remove the offending content from our app.

Please note that our app is provided on an "as is" basis, and we make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, regarding the availability, accuracy, reliability, suitability, or performance of our app or the content provided through it. By using our app, you agree that we will not be liable for any damages, losses, or other harm arising out of your use of our app or reliance on any of the content provided through it. Also you can read our Terms and conditions and Privacy Policy.
Your opinion is important for us!
